entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Airdrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:43 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Calgary Int'l Airport 8:25 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -3.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 0.2 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -3.4°C
Wind: SSE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Sunday night: Fog. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle. Fog. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 8:35 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Fog dissipating. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Fog dissipating late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning. Forecast issued 8:35 PM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
